name: WC Extra Amount On Checkout
author: WPSuperiors

sections.description:
WC extra amount on checkout plugin auto apply extra amount on woocommerce checkout based on different payment gateway, shipping locations, product category, product type, and individual product.

✤ Work Flow ✤
❶ Admin enter Name / Label / Title in text format.
❷ Admin enter the amount in positive integer format.
❸ Admin chooses the amount applied as either a percentage of cart value or a fixed amount.
❹ Admin chooses the applicability (Individual Product, Product Category, Product Type, Shipping Location, Payment Gateway) of applying the amount.
❺ At checkout page based on previous #4 point, the defined amount will be added in terms of #3 point.
❻ The record will be saved into the database, and visibility into the User order email, User order details at My Account, and Admin edit order details page, Admin order notification email.

✤ Free( BASIC ) version ✤

🔸 Automatically apply the predefined amount into the order.
🔸 The amount can be a percentage of the order total or fixed.
🔸 The record can be visible at the order details page of User as well as Admin.
🔸 The unlimited number of the extra amount can be created/edited/deleted.
🔸 The amount can be apllied in case of individual product exists on the cart.
🔸 100% admin manageable.
🔸 No theme and plugin incompatibility.

DEMO

Frontend Checkout Page

Backend Settings Page

✤ Premium version ✤

ALL THE FREE VERSION FEATURES INCLUDING BELOW,
The amount can be applied in the below cases.
🔸 Based on Individual Product.
🔸 Based on Product Category (unlimited number of categories accepted).
🔸 Based on Product Type (Simple, Variable, Downloadable, Grouped, Subscription).
🔸 Based on Shipping Location (Country, State, City, ZIP/PostCode).
🔸 Based on Payment Gateway (PayPal, Stripe, Authorize.NET, and others available in WooCommerce).
🔸 Premium priority support.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WooCommerce 2.5 requires WordPress 4.1+
  • WooCommerce 2.6 requires WordPress 4.4+

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of WooCommerce, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Extra Amount On Checkout” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our plugin.You can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.
And activate it.
*Keep In Mind, Before activating “Extra Amount On Checkout” activate “WooCommerce”

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our plugin and uploading it to your webserver via your favourite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Goto WooCommerce->Extra Amount On Checkout, and play with settings.
sections.faq:
Where can I find documentation and user guides?

Please refer to WC Extra Amount On Checkout – Documentation

Where can I get support or talk to other users?

If you get stuck, you can ask for help in the WP Suport Forum.
Or You can email us support@wpsuperiors.com

Where can I find premium version?

Please refer to WC Extra Amount On Checkout Premium

Where can I request new features?

You can email us support@wpsuperiors.com
